name: Football with friends
description:
It's going to take some fancy footwork to solve these football themed logic-puzzles. Coordinate your team-mates to strike a perfect goal, but do take care not to lose a ball in the long grass! Can you solve every puzzle before the final whistle?

  • Number of puzzles: 14
  • Average play time: 90 minutes (plus extra time)
  • First published: June 2022  (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

puzzlescript implementation - Andrea Gilbert - 2022  
puzzle concept and designs - Andrea Gilbert - 2022
